description: Get creative with cheese pizzas and make this mummy faces recipe to impress your littlest critic. Plus, they're a nutritionally approved treat that the kids will love.
name: Healthier Mummy Faces Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C/180°C fanforced. Line a large baking tray with baking paper.
Spread 1 tbs of passata onto each pizza base. Place olives in the position of eyes. Pull cheese into thin strips and place in a crisscross fashion to resemble bandages.
Bake for 10 minutes or until the cheese has melted slightly. Serve.
